Body:
I purchased a 5inch touchscreen WaveShark.

Screen model

I connected it to the board Raspberry Pi3 model B (OS Android Things) and it immediately displayed the contents of the program.

After that
column9:
I decided to go into the screen settings with the help of hardware keys.

As a result
column10:
the screen goes out and does not detract from the contents of the programs. Simply black screen without backlight.

Can I reset the screen to factory settings? Or how can I solve this problem differently?

Thanks for the help.

"

Body: Thank you, but that didn't help

Try to connect your display to PC (via HDMI) and restore settings manually. And make sure, that settings fo display: [`hdmi_group=2	hdmi_mode=87	hdmi_cvt 800 480 60 6 0 0 0	hdmi_drive=1`](https://www.waveshare.com/wiki/5inch_HDMI_LCD_(H)#Working_with_Raspberry_Pi): is in your `config.txt` file.
Sorry, but how do I get restore setting using PC?
Probably you can see display menu.
No, I don't see the menu :(
In that case, seems your display was broken.
